name: places/ChIJGdLNKuJYwokRR5WykHHIYf4
adrFormatAddress: 941 1st Ave., New York, NY 10022-8031, USA

originalText.text: i have been going here for five years for my fill ins and gel manis. it’s the best. vicky is my girl and can do any shape expertly. they also never break so i often push a month between appointments. i’m always happy after my apple blossom appointments!

text.text: i have been going here for five years for my fill ins and gel manis. it’s the best. vicky is my girl and can do any shape expertly. they also never break so i often push a month between appointments. i’m always happy after my apple blossom appointments!

originalText.text: The ladies here did such an amazing job. I got a pedi and a gel manicure and it was top notch. Included in your service is a free 5ish minutes shoulder massage. The salon was clean and tidy and they were taking all precautions for sanitation. This has been my favorite salon in NYC so far.

text.text: The ladies here did such an amazing job. I got a pedi and a gel manicure and it was top notch. Included in your service is a free 5ish minutes shoulder massage. The salon was clean and tidy and they were taking all precautions for sanitation. This has been my favorite salon in NYC so far.

originalText.text: I am not a big fan of NYC Asian nail spas, so my opinion is tainted. They are clean, there is a huge selection of colors and services, and the price is average. But I have 4 unsatisfying experiences for each good one. Either I don't like the shape of my nails, or the finishing of the polish, or the back rub that I usually add on.

text.text: I am not a big fan of NYC Asian nail spas, so my opinion is tainted. They are clean, there is a huge selection of colors and services, and the price is average. But I have 4 unsatisfying experiences for each good one. Either I don't like the shape of my nails, or the finishing of the polish, or the back rub that I usually add on.

originalText.text: The service was horrible. They didn't remove my callus on my feet like requested and paid for. They made my toenails crooked. The polish didn't last even 3 hours. Went back to see if they could fix it and they literally insulted me in front of the entire salon. Didnt give me a refund or fix it. Never going back! Don't go to Johnny!

text.text: The service was horrible. They didn't remove my callus on my feet like requested and paid for. They made my toenails crooked. The polish didn't last even 3 hours. Went back to see if they could fix it and they literally insulted me in front of the entire salon. Didnt give me a refund or fix it. Never going back! Don't go to Johnny!

originalText.text: Have been a client at New Apple since it's grand opening many years ago.  Wonderful staff and management.  Pleasant space.  Currently "Covid correct" with all required protective measures in place.  There are 6 or 7 nail spas on 1st Ave between 48th and 54th.  This one is the best!
